source:
TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
You spy a blackened envelope on the floor of Archons' Design.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
シャーレアン魔法大学の敷地内に、煤にまみれた封筒が落ちているようだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the ash-covered envelope to the bookish Miqo'te at the Confluence.
target: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_TODO_00<tab>転送魔法研究所のミコッテ族の魔法大学生に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E90AB01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Toffwyb at the Agora.
target: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_TODO_01<tab>アゴラのトフウィブと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the thick candle to the bookish Miqo'te.
target: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_TODO_02<tab>ミコッテ族の魔法大学生に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E90AC01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>You spy an envelope on the ground, covered in ash. Upon closer inspection, you realize that the ash spells out a message.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>煤にまみれた、1枚の封筒が落ちている。
表面には、大きく文字が書かれているようだ。

source:
TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_SECRETLETTER_000_002<tab><var 1A 02 /var>To the kind soul who finds this missive,
Pray deliver this letter to the unassuming Miqo'te scholar who can usually be found sequestered in a quiet corner of the Confluence.
Many thanks.<var 1A 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_SECRETLETTER_000_002<tab>「この封筒を手に取った、志ある者へ。
　どうか本書を、転送魔法研究所の隅にいる、
　ミコッテ族の魔法大学生に手渡されたし」

source: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_003<tab>Yes? Were you looking for me? I suspect I spend too much time in this corner of the Confluence if someone I've never met knows to find me here.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_003<tab>……ええ、たしかに僕はよくここにいます。
こうした隅っこの場所は、落ち着くので好きなんですよ。
でも、それがいったい……？

source: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_004<tab>A letter? If you don't mind me asking, can you tell me where you found this?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_004<tab>これは……。
すみません、この封筒を、どこで？

source: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_006<tab>The place where you chanced upon this is one of dubious prominence. Students are confined there as punishment for...recalcitrant behavior. I believe I recognize the hand which penned this message.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_006<tab>あなたが封筒を拾ったのは、
著しく素行の悪い学生が収監される「学生牢」に面した場所。
コレはきっと、窓から落とされたんでしょうね。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_007<tab>The student is an acquaintance of mine, although that might be a rather generous term. Several days ago he was confined there for concocting an explosive alchemical compound and using it to “surprise” his teachers. His little stunt ended with half the gardens in the Teachers' Quarters in ashes.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_007<tab>そしてその差出人は、
つい数日前に、教授を驚かせようと爆発性の錬金薬を調合し、
勢い余って教授宅の庭を半壊させた、我が悪友です。

source:
TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_008<tab>And it seems he put more effort into writing a message to his would-be courier than to his letter's recipient...
<var 1A 02 /var>Bring me food and a candle.<var 1A 01 /var>
I see...
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_008<tab>封筒内の手紙には、
「軽食と蝋燭を差し入れるべし」と書かれています。
しかし……

source: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_009<tab>That boorish lout! It serves him right, being locked up in that room!
target: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_009<tab>正直、すっごく、めんどくさいッ！！

source: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_010<tab><sigh> As you can doubtless surmise, our relationship is somewhat strained, and I apologize for making you party to it. But what's done is done, and now I would ask a favor of you myself.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_010<tab>とはいえ……腐れ縁ですし、なんとかしてやりますかね。
ここまで関わった以上、あなたにも一枚噛んでもらいます。
大丈夫、報酬は私からお支払いしますよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_011<tab>Could you procure a candle from Toffwyb at the Agora? I shall prepare the food this fool has requested, much as I would rather not. When you are done, pray meet me at the spot where you found the letter.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_011<tab>お手数ですが、アゴラのトフウィブさんから、
<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E90AC01 /var>をもらってきてくれませんか？
私は軽食を用意しますので、封筒のあった場所で合流しましょう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_TOFFWYB_000_012<tab>A candle, you say? Why of course─here, take this. Please inform the requesting student that they can pay at their leisure.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_TOFFWYB_000_012<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E90AC01 /var>がほしいって？
なるほど……それならこれを持っていきな。
代金は後払いでいいからって、頼んだ学生に伝えておいてね。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_TOFFWYB_000_013<tab>The student can pay at their leisure. I know they're good for it.
target: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_TOFFWYB_000_013<tab>代金は後払いでいいからって、頼んだ学生に伝えておいてね。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_014<tab>There you are. Were you able to acquire the candle?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_014<tab>おかえりなさい。
「古風な蝋燭」は、手に入りましたか？

source: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_015<tab>Yes, this shall do. Once again I must apologize for sending you to and fro, but the sooner this matter is concluded, the better off we both shall be.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_015<tab>たしかに。
すみませんね、こんな雑用に付き合わせてしまって。
代金の件も、承知しました。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_016<tab>I suppose since you are from a foreign land, you are unaware of what this candle represents. There is a reason that scoundrel requested a candle of this type.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_016<tab>あなたは異国の方とお見受けしますが……
ならば、「古風な蝋燭」の故事はご存知ないでしょう。
実は、悪友がコレを求めることには理由があるんです。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_017<tab>Long ago, one of the students confined within these rooms spent his days unraveling some of the most troublesome mathematical problems of the time. With nothing to distract his attention, he was quite successful.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_017<tab>その昔、素行不良で学生牢に入れられた生徒がおりまして、
収監中に暇を持て余し、数学上の未解決問題に挑んだところ、
なんと、見事な解を導き出したのです。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_018<tab>He wrote the equations on his wall with the blackened ends of his spent candles. When the professors saw what he had done, well, they were too impressed to be angry.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_018<tab>その際、学生は壁に蝋燭の煤で数式を書き連ねており、
後日それが教授たちの目に留まって、評価が一転したと……。
それ以来、牢の壁は煤だらけというわけです。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_019<tab>Doubtless that idiot means to make his own mark, as many delinquent students have attempted to since. The professors will turn a blind eye to his vandalism, to be sure─they would not let rules impede discovery.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_019<tab>大方、我が悪友も、
これみよがしに数式を書きつけるつもりでしょう。
故事を知るだけに、教授たちも文句は言いませんからね。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_020<tab>Anyroad, I will deliver these to him. Perhaps some good can come of his selfish request. Here, take this for your troubles. I pray there are no more.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC002_04211_CORNERSTUDENT_000_020<tab>とりあえず、品物は私が届けます。
これはお礼と、迷惑料……どうぞお受け取りください。
